OUTLINE : This multicenter , dose-escalation study melphalan . Patients receive buthionine sulfoximine ( BSO ) IV continuously day 1-3 melphalan isolate limb infusion ( ILI ) 30 minute day 2 absence progressive disease unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo biopsy blood sample collection baseline , immediately ILI , 12 week ILI time disease progression .
